chart.title: Active Clients by Groups
chart.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval group_list=mvjoin(client_groups,",") | stats latest(group_list) as Groups by client_mac | stats count as Active by Groups

chart.title: Traffic Volume by Client Groups
chart.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval Groups=mvjoin(client_groups,",") | stats sum(down_gb) as Down sum(up_gb) as Up by Groups | eval GB=Up+Down | fields Groups,GB

chart.title: Traffic Volume by Client
chart.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | stats sum(down_gb) as Down sum(up_gb) as Up by client_mac | eval GB=Up+Down | eval Client=client_mac | sort - GB | fields Client,GB

table.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval Client=client_mac | stats mode(radio_hwaddr) as "Most Used Radio" mode(service_uuid) as "Most Used Service" sum(up_mb) as sum_up_mb sum(down_mb) as sum_down_mb by Client | eval total_mb=sum_up_mb+sum_down_mb | eval Down=round(sum_down_mb,1) . " MB" | eval Up=round(sum_up_mb,1) . " MB" | sort - total_mb | fields Client,"Most Used Radio","Most Used Service",Up,Down
